short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a open source project to provide people with a simple Arduino Serial Monitor to be used on Chrome or Chrome enabled devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple serial monitor to be used with Arduino or any other serial device. It connects to the serial port using Javascript and allows users to send and receive data to and from the device.

This application does not collect any Personally Identifiable Information (PII) data from users.
